short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Inscribe extension enables users to make notes

long.ar,es,fr,hi,ja,pt_PT,ru,zh_CN: The Inscribe Chrome Extension helps users make notes which users can store locally or on their browsers
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Introducing Inscribe, your indispensable web browsing companion. Inscribe enriches your online experience with an array of powerful features. Seamlessly attach sticky notes to any webpage, ensuring your ideas and thoughts are never lost. Our intuitive speech-to-text functionality on the main extension UI transforms spoken words into written notes effortlessly. Enhance your creativity with the drawing feature, allowing you to illustrate your ideas. Best of all, Inscribe stores your notes locally, preserving your privacy. Revolutionize the way you capture and organize information while you surf the web. Try Inscribe today and elevate your online note-taking to a new level of convenience and productivity.

Please Note: Only premium users can make sketches or drawings on Inscribe.
Also, internet access is needed to use the speech-to-text feature on Inscribe to validate your subscription package.
